Description.Name: Sample hardware abstraction for MT3620 RDB
MainCoreHeaderFileTopContent: // This file defines the mapping from the MT3620 reference development board (RDB) to the
// 'sample hardware' abstraction used by the samples at https://github.com/xiongyu0523/azure-sphere-arducam-mini-2mp-plus.
// Some peripherals are on-board on the RDB, while other peripherals must be attached externally if needed.
// See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure-sphere/app-development/manage-hardware-dependencies for more information on how to use hardware abstractions
// to enable apps to work across multiple hardware variants.

Peripherals.Name: ARDUCAM_CS
Peripherals.Comment: Connect CS to RDB Header1 Pin12(GPIO4)

Peripherals.Name: ARDUCAM_I2C
Peripherals.Comment: Connect I2C to RDB Header2 Pin1(SDA) and Pin7(SCL)

Peripherals.Name: ARDUCAM_SPI
Peripherals.Comment: Connect SPI to RDB Header4 Pin5(MISO), Pin7(SCLK), Pin11(MOSI)

Peripherals.Name: ILI9341_RST
Peripherals.Comment: Connect RST to RDB Header1 Pin4(GPIO0)

Peripherals.Name: ILI9341_DC
Peripherals.Comment: Connect DC to RDB Header1 Pin6(GPIO1)

Peripherals.Name: ILI9341_BL
Peripherals.Comment: Connect BL to RDB Header1 Pin8(GPIO2)

Peripherals.Name: ILI9341_SPI
Peripherals.Comment: Connect SPI to RDB Header3 Pin5(SCLK), Pin7(MOSI), Pin9(MISO), Pin11(CSA)
